phrases: Some villagers lost their lives in the attack.
We are at war with a raccoon dog.
Thanks to you, Saizo, we kept Isanami from falling into Ieyasu's hands.
I have a favor to ask of you.
I do not like the sound of that.
I want you to take Isanami and go to Izumo.
Then what was the point of keeping her here?
Old man, are you sure you are not crazy?
How dare you call Yukimura-sama crazy?!
I am Kakei Juzo, one of Yukimura-sama's men.
Who are you who dares to speak so rudely to his superiors?
Kakei has been investigating why Izumo was attacked.
Tokugawa stayed in Izumo long after he burned it to the ground.
from the shrine to the treasury and the priestess' quarters.
What was he so desperate to find?
So that is why he is after the sole survivor, Isanami.
If they have not found it yet, it may still be at Izumo.
We will have to send Isanami to Izumo because of her familiarity with the area.
I will get to travel with Saizo, right?
Do you understand how dangerous this will be?
I will be fine as long as I am with you.
The power to destroy all living things...
He will help us keep in touch.
I can take him with me?
Sasuke, you are quite good with women.
He is such a shy kid.
This is why I hate traveling with women!
Do not tell me he is coming with us.
Kakei has become very familiar with many regions during his travels.
I have asked him to help you protect Isanami.
But I was looking forward to my trip with Saizo!
I was so excited thinking about it last night that I could not sleep!
This was supposed to be my trip with Saizo!
I cannot believe I am going back to Izumo.
You never know where life will take you.
I would not want to ruin our trip by sulking the whole time.
I refuse to walk with such a slut!
Young women should not show off their skin for anyone to see.
It is easy to move in these clothes.
Ana does not cover her chest or legs.
However, Ana's job as a ninja requires her to wear those clothes.
Besides, how can you behave so flippantly on such an important mission?
If it were not for Yukimura-sama's orders I would never travel with you.
But I want to sleep in a bed and take a bath.
The road to Izumo is long.
Kakei-san, let us each keep watch for half the night.
Why are you always like this?
Shut up and get off me.
If you are, I apologize for calling your wife a slut.
She just does not know the meaning of shame.
She had a real comfortable upbringing in Izumo.
She does not know the ways of the world.
I will never sleep with you.
Why did Yukimura-sama make her one of his braves?
I need one brave warrior for each finger on these two hands.
Sasuke, Rokuro, Anastasia and me, plus you and Isanami.
but I can see why Yukimura-sama chose you.
However, Isanami is just an ordinary girl.
Who are you calling a brave?
He cannot make me be one.
We have not passed anyone for a while.
I cannot do anything with this worthless foot.
We cannot leave a woman here by herself.
Why do not we take her to the foot of the mountain?
Saizo, we cannot abandon someone in need.
You would die if you fell from here.
It is a long way down, look.
Shut up, I can see it.
I, Yuri Kamanosuke-sama, will simply take everything you have of value.
This woman's got some jade on her.
You are pretty well off, are not you?
You cannot escape from my wind.
I noticed you are hiding weapons all over your body.
As long as I keep you bound, this will be easy, ninja.
Do whatever you want with her when you are done.
Do not get ahead of yourself, thief.
Is this girl that important to you?
Sorry you will not be able to save her.
You do not know what you are talking about.
I would never make it as a ninja,
if I died to something like this.
If you do not shut up, I will cut your legs off.
I am looking for a fun new toy to play with.
That ninja was awfully protective of you.
Is not that just damn peachy?
I am sure he will come to rescue you.
I wonder what face he will make...
I have killed lots of people before,
but I think this will be the most fun I have had.
But you should not judge the hobbies of others so harshly.
Taking from others is my only pleasure.
What do you think people are?
Why do not you stop doing this and
Did not I tell you not to criticize my hobbies?
I just cannot deal with worthless women like you.
You cannot do anything for yourself, but you never shut up.
Girls like you, who rely on men for everything,
are the least deserving of life.
He seems to be making an example of her.
He is probably trying to lure us in.
We need to find a path.
The shortest route's right in front of us.
First she gets kidnapped, and now I am climbing a cliff.
A lookout cannot let his guard down.
Are you really that worried about them?
I hate Iga ninja, but he is strong.
He will become stronger and return.
It is a funny word, though.
You chose quite the location for your castle.
What are you, king of the mountain?
Hurry on up here before something terrible happens.
What is a ninja doing charging in head on?
You are an absolutely terrible guy.
That is the sort of man you are.
The smell of blood, those eyes...
Those eyes have seen deep darkness.
No, more than me, have not you?
Do not you enjoy the sight of blood?
Let us have some fun together.
You are not done yet, are you?
I did not even see it.
It is just as I thought.
I cannot get enough of those eyes.
They do not waver at the sight of blood.
It is amazing, amazing, unbelievably amazing!
I am almost there, you bastard.
Plunge that sword into me and send me over the edge.
But the things he did to you...
And you came here to save me, did not you?
Killing women leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Who are you calling a woman?
Live and turn yourself over to the officials.
I will never do something like that!
One mistake and Saizo would have cut you instead.
She is more trouble than she is worth.
I am the one who was rescued.
He cannot take any more, huh?
He will not let this one go.
He must be at his limit if he is sending me this.
we will have to take care of the business at Izumo first.
As it broke, away he ran.
The little mouse stole our rice, squeak!
All that action made me hungry.
Let us get something to eat.
I will send Akeha to get more money from Yukimura-sama
This is not a sightseeing trip.
The next episode of Brave 10 is The Souls of the Gods.
